info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 31 at 5:56PM MDT until July 31 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula MT
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of west central Montana, including the following county, Granite.
This includes the following Specific Areas... Frontage Road from Bearmouth to Drummond.
* WHEN...Until 800 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 556 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.3 to 0.6 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - This includes the following Specific Areas... Frontage Road from Bearmouth to Drummond. - https://www.weather.gov/mso/hydrology
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING
